original_text: And ye shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers; and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
korean_text: 내가 너희 조상들에게 준 땅에서 너희가 거주하면서 내 백성이 되고 나는 너희 하나님이 되리라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall dwell in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그 땅에 거할 것이며

sentences.original_text: that I gave to your fathers
and ye shall be my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 내 백성이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and I will be your God
